sn45.13:4.2: Then a mendicant went up to the Buddha …
sn45.13:4.4: “Sir, they speak of this person called ‘a trainee’.
sn45.13:5.1: “Mendicant, it’s someone who has a trainee’s right view, right motivation, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, and right samādhi.
sn45.13:5.3: That’s how a trainee is defined.”
